Twitter botclose

This slack bot allows users to detect emotions or perform emotion analysis by sending it a picture with human faces.

With the power of the awesome Kairos Emotion API, it can tell how likely the emaion is on a human face in the given photo, by giving a set of percentages.

Neartuitmore_vert

A content management system for Neartuit

Google Firebase
nodeJS
jQuery
CMS
Stripe API
check this website
Neartuit CMSclose

Neartuit uses iBeacons to detect a visitor’s location in order to provide a better experience for venue and exhibition activities.

This project includes a content management system and a mobile APP. It uses Google Firebase as database, nodeJS to provide back-end services, pureJS, CSS, and HTML for the front-end CMS.

Mr.Booker Tmore_vert

An Amazon Alexa Skill

Cloud Computing
AWS Alexa Skill
nodeJS
microservices
Amazon AWS
check this source code
Mr.Booker Tclose

This is an Amazon Alexa skill that enables a study room booking service on campus.

You as a student can simply speak to Alexa with natural language (English supported only), tell it your desired reservation time spot and room size. Then it will find a room for you, handle the user verification and authentication and make a reservation.

visit this website
Moro Babyclose

A great photographer owns a studio also takes beautiful photos for new-born babies and their parents.

This website was created on the photographer's request, using C#.net and SQL Server, running on a solely hosted server environment, and has been running well for over 6 years.
